name: Auto Dark Mode
description:
Automatically change IDEA theme according to OS settings (dark/light/high contrast).
        Currently works on Windows, macOS and Linux (Gnome only).

        You can change the default theme used in the plugin settings under "Other Settings"->"Auto Dark Mode".

        Note: When using the plugin on Catalina in "Auto" mode at least one restart is needed for dark mode detection to
        work properly.
notes:
v1.5.1
  • Made dark mode detection more reliable.
  • Improved compatibility with third party tools such as NightOwl.
v1.5.0
  • Added option to individually choose whether the IDE/editor theme gets changed.
